$if.name: $if

checks the expression and executes code inside it if true
you can use $elseIf to check other conditions if previous one is false
you can use $else to execute code block if nothing is true

$else.name: $else
$else.description: is used in case $if and $elseIf is not true

$textSlice.description: Returns <text> after given position or text in between X and Y

$textTrim.name: $textTrim
$textTrim.description: Removes useless spaces from given text.

$mentionType.name: $mentionType
$mentionType.description: Uses an argument to determine the type of the mention (role, user, channel or none).

$initVar.name: $initVar
$initVar.description: initalizes a Var with a default value if the var is undefined or does not exist

$deleteServerVar.name: $deleteServerVar
$deleteServerVar.description: Delete a server var from database.

$deleteChannelVar.name: $deleteChannelVar
$deleteChannelVar.description: Delete a channel var from database.

$deleteMessageVar.name: $deleteMessageVar
$deleteMessageVar.description: Delete a message var from database.

$uri.name: $uri

$regexMatch.name: $regexMatch
$regexMatch.description: To match a text with regex expression

$stop.name: $stop
$stop.description: It will cause the interpreter to stop the execution

$setTimeout.name: $setTimeout
$setTimeout.description: Will execute the code inside it after certain time

$parseTime.name: $parseTime
$parseTime.description: Parse human readable time into milliseconds

$button.name: $button
$button.description: Creates a Discord Button with a label ,color ,id/link

$buttonID.name: $buttonID
$buttonID.description: return the button ID, return undefined if not found

$buttonEmoji.name: $buttonEmoji
$buttonEmoji.description: return the clicked button emoji in Button trigger, return undefined if not found

$buttonLabel.name: $buttonLabel
$buttonLabel.description: return the clicked button label in Button trigger, return undefined if not found

$buttonURL.name: $buttonURL
$buttonURL.description: return the clicked button URL in Button trigger if exists , return undefined if not found

$buttonStyle.name: $buttonStyle
$buttonStyle.description: return the clicked button style like blurple/red/url in Button trigger, return undefined if not found

$buttonIsDisabled.name: $buttonIsDisabled
$buttonIsDisabled.description: return true if button is disabled, false otherwise, return undefined if not found

$forEach.name: $forEach
$forEach.description: Will loop over a list and every loop it will take an item and assign in inside varname accessible by $get[varname]
$forEach.code: $forEach[varname;LIST (ex: mido rake azz);Seperator (Optional, default is space)]

$seq.name: $seq
$seq.description:
return sequence of Numbers decided by a starting (inclusive) number and stop at ending (inclusive) number with step
Max of 1k number

$addButton.name: $addButton
$addButton.description: Adding a button to a message
$addButton.code: $addButton[Message ID;Label;style/url;link/id;emoji(optional);Adding in new row (yes/no, optional); disabled (yes/no, optional)]

$removeButton.description: Remove a button from a message by (label/emoji/url/id)
$removeButton.code: $removeButton[Message ID;Label/Emoji/URL/ID (optional, empty means removing the last button)]

params.label: Label/Emoji/URL/ID (optional, empty means removing the last button)
choices: ID (optional, empty means removing the last button)

$getObjectKeys.name: $getObjectKeys
$getObjectKeys.description: Return the object keys with seperator (default is space if not provided)

$function.name: $function
$function.description:
Create a user-defined function that can be called by $callFunction or $functionName (see !!func $callFunction)
**Note:** function name cant start with number, and must be within [A-Z or a-z or _ or 0-9]

$callFunction.name: $callFunction
$callFunction.description: To call a user-defined function created by $function

$return.name: $return
$return.description:
Can only be used inside user-defined function created by $function
It has no effect outside the user-defined function

$dm.name: $dm
$dm.description: Redirects the output to a user dm

$sendDM.name: $sendDM
$sendDM.description: Sends a dm message to given user ID.
$sendDM.code: $sendDM[userID (optional);message;return message id or undefined,if message could not be send (yes/no , default is no)]

params.label: return message id or undefined,if message could not be send (yes/no , default is no)
choices: undefined,if message could not be send (yes

$modifyRole.name: $modifyRole
$modifyRole.description: Modifies the role by using their ID.
